lead_paragraph: STUCKY--Steven. The Directors of the Aaron Copland Fund for Music, Inc. acknowledge with deep sorrow the passing of our distinguished board member, Steven Stucky. He was a composer of great stature who gave unstintingly of his time to the Fund and to a wide variety of other music organizations, most notably The American Music Center where he played a key role in forming its successor, New Music USA. He was a devoted and beloved teacher and a person of rare warmth and generosity of spirit. His passing leaves a profound void in the music world and in the hearts of his friends and colleagues. We offer our deepest condolences to his family. The Aaron Copland Fund for Music, Inc. Christopher Rouse, President James M. Kendrick, Executive Vice President & Secretary 1/3
